[[Brandy Hall]], [[Buckland]] | affiliation= | language= | birth={{SR|1260}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death={{SR|1360}} | deathlocation= | age=100 | notablefor= | family=[[Took Family|Took]] | parentage=[[Gerontius Took]] and [[Adamanta Chubb]] | siblings=[[Isengrim Took III|Isengrim]], [[Hildigard Took|Hildigard]], [[Isumbras Took IV|Isumbras]], [[Hildigrim Took|Hildigrim]], [[Isembold Took|Isembold]], [[Hildifons Took|Hildifons]], [[Isembard Took|Isembard]], [[Hildibrand Took|Hildibrand]], [[Belladonna Took|Belladonna]], [[Donnamira Took|Donnamira]] and [[Isengar Took|Isengar]] | spouse=[[Gorbadoc Brandybuck]] | children=[[Rorimac Brandybuck|Rorimac]], [[Amaranth Brandybuck|Amaranth]], [[Saradas Brandybuck|Saradas]], [[Dodinas Brandybuck|Dodinas]], [[Asphodel Brandybuck|Asphodel]], [[Dinodas Brandybuck|Dinodas]] and [[Primula Brandybuck|Primula]] | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Mirabella Brandybuck, n√©e Took''', was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]]. ==History== Mirabella was one of the [[Gerontius Took|Old Took]]'s many children, and his youngest daughter.{{App|Took}} She married [[Gorbadoc Brandybuck]], and had seven children: [[Rorimac Brandybuck|Rorimac]], [[Amaranth Brandybuck|Amaranth]], [[Saradas Brandybuck|Saradas]], [[Dodinas Brandybuck|Dodinas]], [[Asphodel Brandybuck|Asphodel]], [[Dinodas Brandybuck|Dinodas]] and [[Primula Brandybuck|Primula]].{{App|Brandybuck}} ==Etymology== The name is French and refers to the palm tree fruit.{{HM|IE}}, "Giving of Names" The name participates in a circular wordplay with the names of her sisters, [[Donnamira Took|Donna'''mira''']] and [[Belladonna Took|'''Bella'''donna]], all Italian names. {{references}} [[Category:Brandybuck]] [[Category:Hobbits]] [[Category:Took]] [[Category:Greco-Roman names]] [[Category:Third Age characters]] [[de:Mirabella Brandybock]] [[fi:Mirabella Tuk]] [[fr:encyclo/personnages/hobbits/touque/mirabella touque]]
